survey_name: Employee Engagement and Workplace Culture Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee engagement levels and workplace culture within the organization to identify areas for improvement and enhance overall job satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current role at the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current role at the company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the workplace culture do you value the most? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture nuanced preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the workplace culture do you value the most? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you receive feedback from your manager?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency options to avoid ambiguity.

script.question_text: How often do you receive feedback from your manager?

questions.question_text: What is one thing the company could improve to enhance employee engagement?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your contributions are recognized and valued by the company?
